formalpara.title: Figure 2. Phylogenetic tree of the srw family, rooted with a group of FMRF-amide and other peptide receptors from nematodes and insects
formalpara.para: Large arrows indicate a Drosophila FRMFamide receptor (Meeusen et al., 2002), a Drosophila myosuppressin receptor (Egerod et al., 2003), and one of the three C. elegans FMRFamide receptors (Mertens et al., 2004). See Figure 1 legend for details of methods and symbols. Right click or control-click for larger image.
